findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint an unlimited number of tokens, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The owner of the contract loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Owner cannot burn tokens
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Owner cannot block users
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to block users.

findings.title: Owner cannot pause contract
findings.description: The owner of the smart contract does not have the ability to pause the contract.
